original_text: So I will start a fire. And the fire will destroy the big city of Teman. The fire will also burn the strong buildings of Bozrah city.’ 1: So I will start a fire. And the fire will destroy the big city of Teman. The fire will also burn the strong buildings of Bozrah city.’ 1: So I will start a fire. And the fire will destroy the big city of Teman. The fire will also burn the strong buildings of Bozrah city.’ 1: So I will start a fire. And the fire will destroy the big city of Teman. The fire will also burn the strong buildings of Bozrah city.’
korean_text: 내가 데만에 불을 보내리니 보스라의 궁궐들을 사르리라

sentences.original_text: So I will start a fire.
And the fire will destroy the big city of Teman.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 불은 테만이라는 큰 도시를 파괴할 것이다.

sentences.original_text: The fire will also burn the strong buildings of Bozrah city.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 불은 또한 보스라 성의 견고한 건물들도 태울 것이다.
